CustomField.description: KIS BIlling - Suppress True = Account Name + Appends Month YYYY(NB) + adds the Custom Invoice Description value or Suppress False = Standard Description + Appends Month YYYY(NB) + adds the Custom Invoice Description value for NB Invoice Descriptions
CustomField.inlineHelpText: KIS BIlling - Suppress True = Account Name + Appends Month YYYY(NB) + adds the Custom Invoice Description value or Suppress False = Standard Description + Appends Month YYYY(NB) + adds the Custom Invoice Description value for NB Invoice Descriptions
CustomField.label: NB Invoice Description
